segments.text: Hello . This is Doctor Bell ’ s Office . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . This is Taylor Wright calling . I ’ Ve got an appointment with Doctor Bell at 9.00 tomorrow morning . I ’ Ve got to cancel this appointment . My father-in-law passed away suddenly last night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry to hear that . Cancelling the appointment is no problem . Thank you for your call .
segments.speaker: S1
